verses.text: And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* unto \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

\w Speak|strong="H1696"\w* unto \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w*, and unto his \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*, and unto all the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, and \w say|strong="H0559"\w* unto them; This \add is\add* the \w thing|strong="H1697"\w* which the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* hath \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

\w What|strong="H0376"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* soever \add there be\add* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, that \w killeth|strong="H7819"\w* an \w ox|strong="H7794"\w*, or \w lamb|strong="H3775"\w*, or \w goat|strong="H5795"\w*, in the \w camp|strong="H4264"\w*, or that \w killeth|strong="H7819"\w* \add it\add* \w out|strong="H2351"\w* of the \w camp|strong="H4264"\w*,

And \w bringeth|strong="H0935"\w* it not unto the \w door|strong="H6607"\w* of the \w tabernacle|strong="H0168"\w* of the \w congregation|strong="H4150"\w*, to \w offer|strong="H7126"\w* an \w offering|strong="H7133"\w* unto the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \w tabernacle|strong="H4908"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*; \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* shall be \w imputed|strong="H2803"\w* unto that \w man|strong="H0376"\w*; he hath \w shed|strong="H8210"\w* \w blood|strong="H1818"\w*; and that \w man|strong="H0376"\w* shall be cut \w off|strong="H3772"\w* from \w among|strong="H7130"\w* his \w people|strong="H5971"\w*:

To the end that the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* may \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* their \w sacrifices|strong="H2077"\w*, which they \w offer|strong="H2076"\w* in the \w open|strong="H6440"\w* \w field|strong="H7704"\w*, even that they may \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* them unto the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, unto the \w door|strong="H6607"\w* of the \w tabernacle|strong="H0168"\w* of the \w congregation|strong="H4150"\w*, unto the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*, and \w offer|strong="H2076"\w* them \add for\add* \w peace|strong="H8002"\w* \w offerings|strong="H2077"\w* unto the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*.

And the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* shall \w sprinkle|strong="H2236"\w* the \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* upon the \w altar|strong="H4196"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \add at\add* the \w door|strong="H6607"\w* of the \w tabernacle|strong="H0168"\w* of the \w congregation|strong="H4150"\w*, and \w burn|strong="H6999"\w* the \w fat|strong="H2459"\w* for a \w sweet|strong="H5207"\w* \w savour|strong="H7381"\w* unto the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*.

And they shall no more \w offer|strong="H2076"\w* their \w sacrifices|strong="H2077"\w* unto \w devils|strong="H8163"\w*, \w after|strong="H0310"\w* whom they have gone a \w whoring|strong="H2181"\w*. This shall be a \w statute|strong="H2708"\w* for \w ever|strong="H5769"\w* unto them throughout their \w generations|strong="H1755"\w*.

¶ And thou shalt \w say|strong="H0559"\w* unto them, Whatsoever \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \add there be\add* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, or of the \w strangers|strong="H1616"\w* which \w sojourn|strong="H1481"\w* \w among|strong="H8432"\w* you, that \w offereth|strong="H5927"\w* a burnt \w offering|strong="H5930"\w* or \w sacrifice|strong="H2077"\w*,

And \w bringeth|strong="H0935"\w* it not unto the \w door|strong="H6607"\w* of the \w tabernacle|strong="H0168"\w* of the \w congregation|strong="H4150"\w*, to \w offer|strong="H6213"\w* it unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*; even that \w man|strong="H0376"\w* shall be cut \w off|strong="H3772"\w* from among his \w people|strong="H5971"\w*.

¶ And whatsoever \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \add there be\add* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, or of the \w strangers|strong="H1616"\w* that \w sojourn|strong="H1481"\w* \w among|strong="H8432"\w* you, that \w eateth|strong="H0398"\w* any manner of \w blood|strong="H1818"\w*; I will even \w set|strong="H5414"\w* my \w face|strong="H6440"\w* against that \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* that \w eateth|strong="H0398"\w* \w blood|strong="H1818"\w*, and will cut him \w off|strong="H3772"\w* from \w among|strong="H7130"\w* his \w people|strong="H5971"\w*.

For the \w life|strong="H5315"\w* of the \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w* \add is\add* in the \w blood|strong="H1818"\w*: and I have \w given|strong="H5414"\w* it to you upon the \w altar|strong="H4196"\w* to make an \w atonement|strong="H3722"\w* for your \w souls|strong="H5315"\w*: for it \add is\add* the \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* \add that\add* maketh an \w atonement|strong="H3722"\w* for the \w soul|strong="H5315"\w*.

Therefore I \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, No \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* of you shall \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* \w blood|strong="H1818"\w*, neither shall any \w stranger|strong="H1616"\w* that \w sojourneth|strong="H1481"\w* \w among|strong="H8432"\w* you \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* \w blood|strong="H1818"\w*.

And whatsoever \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \add there be\add* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, or of the \w strangers|strong="H1616"\w* that \w sojourn|strong="H1481"\w* \w among|strong="H8432"\w* you, which \w hunteth|strong="H6679"\w* and \w catcheth|strong="H6718"\w* any \w beast|strong="H2416"\w* or \w fowl|strong="H5775"\w* that may be \w eaten|strong="H0398"\w*; he shall even \w pour|strong="H8210"\w* out the \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* thereof, and \w cover|strong="H3680"\w* it with \w dust|strong="H6083"\w*.\f + \fr 17.13 \ft which…: Heb. that hunteth any hunting\f*

For \add it is\add* the \w life|strong="H5315"\w* of all \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w*; the \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* of it \add is\add* for the \w life|strong="H5315"\w* thereof: therefore I \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, Ye shall \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* the \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* of no manner of \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w*: for the \w life|strong="H5315"\w* of all \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w* \add is\add* the \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* thereof: whosoever \w eateth|strong="H0398"\w* it shall be cut \w off|strong="H3772"\w*.

And every \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* that \w eateth|strong="H0398"\w* that which \w died|strong="H5038"\w* \add of itself\add*, or that which was \w torn|strong="H2966"\w* \add with beasts, whether it be\add* one of your own \w country|strong="H0249"\w*, or a \w stranger|strong="H1616"\w*, he shall both \w wash|strong="H3526"\w* his \w clothes|strong="H0899"\w*, and \w bathe|strong="H7364"\w* \add himself\add* in \w water|strong="H4325"\w*, and be \w unclean|strong="H2930"\w* until the \w even|strong="H6153"\w*: then shall he be \w clean|strong="H2891"\w*.\f + \fr 17.15 \ft that which died…: Heb. a carcase\f*
But if he \w wash|strong="H3526"\w* \add them\add* not, nor \w bathe|strong="H7364"\w* his \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w*; then he shall \w bear|strong="H5375"\w* his \w iniquity|strong="H5771"\w*.
